Title: Authorizes the town of Smithtown to make ordinances regarding longbows and crossbows
Summary: Authorizes the town of Smithtown, in the county of Suffolk to make ordinances prohibiting the discharge of longbows and crossbows in areas in which such activity may be hazardous to the general public or nearby residents.
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the town law, in relation to authorizing the town of Smithtown to make ordinances regarding longbows and crossbows
